titleStmt.title: Fiftie godlie and learned sermons diuided into fiue decades, conteyning the chiefe and principall pointes of Christian religion, written in three seuerall tomes or sections, by Henrie Bullinger minister of the churche of Tigure in Swicerlande. Whereunto is adioyned a triple or three-folde table verie fruitefull and necessarie. Translated out of Latine into English by H.I. student in diuinitie.
Sermonum decades quinque. English
titleStmt.author: Bullinger, Heinrich, 1504-1575.
H. I., student in divinity.

publicationStmt.publisher: By [Henry Middleton for] Ralphe Newberrie, dwelling in Fleet-streate a little aboue the Conduite,

notesStmt.note: A translation of: Sermonum decades quinque.
From p. 492 on, even page numbers are on rectos.
Reproduction of the original in the Henry E. Huntington Library and Art Gallery.
